Nightshift nods casually to Bump.

" Just keep me as is, without the dents =
and damage, a set of all weather, all terrain tires, heavy duty if they're =
available and a launching system for my alt mode so I can deploy grenades a=
s well as missile darts.   Oh yeah, new suspension system and a refresher p=
aint job and rust prevention treatment."

He smiles.

"Just kidd'n about th=
e paint job thing."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Jul =

here was an understanding nod from BUMP, "We will have you out of

st as soon as we can." He walked over to NIGHTLIGHT and

 viewscreen next to her bed. "Fuzors are far more

e originaly

ndle

hat if

ised.  On

'em at a

 then he

>> He turns his head over to Bump.
>>

n out Hydras visual circuitry?"

shrug from BUMP, "Well a simple flash-bang
> grenade could do it. It is bas=
ically a bright light followed by a
> deafening noise." He shrugged again, =
"I am not typically a weapons

 stores."

igns,
